item.description:
View the Scituate Reservoir Loop

1st Meetup location: Dunkin Donuts, 1550 West Main Road Portsmouth, RI

2nd Meetup location:  Dunkin Donuts, 1999 Plainfield Pike Unit 4, Johnston, RI, 02919 to meet up with Boston Tier 1 Riders.

I will not be on this ride due to previous obligations, but posting for those who want to meet up with Boston Tier 1 Riders at the 2nd meetup location.  If plans change for me, I will be there.   If nobody shows by 10:15am at the 1st Meetup Location, continue on to the 2nd Meetup Location. 

The Boston group has 7 confirmed riders right now.  Its a 45min ride between the 1st, and 2nd location, so you will get there 15min before the Boston group.

This is a great hidden route that not many know about, I recommend you all check it out if you can.

Hope to see you there!
item.why: Im told by Mike the sweeping turns here are incredible.
item.name: Scituate Reservoir Loop/Joint Ride w/Boston Tier 1 Riders
